item.title: Once Human: Telephone Booth Puzzle Guide
item.description:
There's more to Once Human than building bases and gunning down monsters. The world is rich with sidequests and interesting anomalies that tend to have good rewards. The mysterious telephone booths in the game's starting area is one such anomaly, and you can get a decent haul of materials from them if you figure out what they want.

The telephone booth puzzle in Once Human is just one of many weird world events scattered about the map. This one isn't particularly difficult to solve, but for new Once Human players who are confused about it, here's what you need to do.

Once Human Telephone Booth Puzzle, Explained

This is less of a puzzle and more of a scavenger hunt. You don't have to do much here â€” just find the telephone booths, interact with them, and go to the center point between all phone booths to find a loot chest.

To recap, the phone booths are found in the Dayton Wetlands region. Specifically, they're on the farm portion of Brookham in Once Human . The phones are a bit scattered, but once you find one, it'll be marked on your map for future reference. The map above shows the location of the phone booths, but if you're having trouble finding them, listen closely for a ringing phone, and you'll find yourself going the right direction.

Now, if you really can't find the phones, try coming back at night between 7PM and 6AM. If the phones still aren't in any of the spots noted above, then try moving to a different world. This shouldn't be necessary for many players, but it's there as an option if you need it.

Rewards

As mentioned, answering all the phone booths causes a rewards chest to spawn. Open it up, and you'll find a bunch of goodies, including Energy Links, Controllers, Stardust Source, and Stellar Planula. These might not seem like much, but their value adds up once you start getting more of them.

Getting Energy Links in Once Human can get tedious. You need them to teleport around the map, upgrade weapons, and unlock memetics, to name a few. Stellar Planula is even harder to get as you can only obtain them from quests. You'll eventually get enough of this to buy everything from the Stellar Planula store, but reaching that point will take a while.

Stardust Source is used for crafting advanced items like AP ammo, Quick Activators, and so on. Meanwhile, Controllers are for obtaining full rewards from the chests that appear after boss fights or Securement Silo runs. If you don't use a Controller to open them, you'll get less valuable rewards, so make sure to have a healthy stock of these handy.

item.title: 7 Great Games For Streaming On Twitch
item.description:
Highlights

  • League of Legends on Twitch offers fast-paced gameplay and a wide variety of champions to keep viewers engaged.
  • Fortnite's high popularity and wide variety of content, including modes like Party Royale, make it a top choice for streaming.
  • Chained Together may be newer, but its collaboration and unpredictable moments make it a must-watch on Twitch.

Twitch is a popular platform where viewers can check out streamers as they play through popular games, chat with their audience, or even just create some art for their audience to enjoy. There are many games being streamed through this platform, though there are a select few that just seem to fit perfectly with Twitch.

These games feature either incredibly interactive multiplayer modes or offer a lot of content that will keep viewers coming back for more. Depending on what kind of genre a viewer is interested in, these are some of the best games that are perfect for streaming on Twitch.

1 League of Legends

The Legendary MOBA

League of Legends is one of the most popular games around the globe, well-loved in so many countries. The iconic MOBA lets players work together with their friends or online teammates to create an unstoppable team.

Viewers on Twitch will find this game particularly enjoyable to watch due to the wide variety of champions available to build, meaning there's always something new to do. The gameplay in League of Legends is incredibly fast-paced and difficult, making it one of the best options to stream on Twitch to add interest and keep viewers glued to their screens. The competitive aspect of League of Legends also makes it one of the most popular games on Twitch, thanks to it being one of the faces of Esports.

2 Fortnite

A Well-Loved Classic

Throughout the years that it's been available, Fortnite still holds a high spot in the most popular games on Twitch, and easily deserves its spot, especially now with all the available content for players, including its massive library of skins.

Fortnite has expanded greatly, now offering modes such as racing, the popular Lego Fortnite similar in style to Minecraft , and even Party Royale, where players can enjoy mini-games with their friends. Though most streamers will stick to the usual Battle Royale mode in Fortnite , this game is one of the best options for streaming on Twitch due to its high popularity and wide variety.

3 Chained Together

Teamwork Required

As a newer entry, Chained Together is an unexpected option but is certainly worth a watch on Twitch. For those who have played the game before, players must work together with others and talk with friends actively in order to make a plan on how to make it over the next obstacle. This means viewers won't have to worry about extended periods of time of no talking or a lack of hilarious interactions, as something new and funny is always bound to happen.

Though this game is still gaining traction on the platform, it is almost like it was made to be viewed, so fans can watch their favorite streamers struggle and fight desperately to reach the top. Fans will find themselves tuning in to Chained Together streams for long periods of time, as that is most likely how long it'll take the streamer to successfully reach the end with their squad, especially if they are beginners.

4 Minecraft

Infinite Possibilities

Not only can gamers play in survival mode in Minecraft , but there is also the option to enter creative mode and build just about anything they can dream of. The options available in this game make it the perfect option to stream on Twitch, as streamers can either work towards building some beautiful scenery, like recreating Hogwarts or working together with their friends to survive the harsh surroundings.

There's an endless amount of content available in the open-world game Minecraft , and even outside these two basic modes, streamers can also take part in parkour competitions or even start a new story in a mod created by fans. There's so much to do that is sure to satisfy all viewers, whether they want a cozy experience or all-out war.

5 No Man's Sky

Extensive Exploration

No Man's Sky was released in 2016 to scathing reviews. However, similar to Cyberpunk 2077 , the game vastly improved and expanded its gameplay, making it the perfect option to stream on Twitch. This game can be very interactive with an audience, allowing viewers to assist streamers in finding a new planet to visit, as well as discover new phenomena and life on each planet.

No Man's Sky also offers multiplayer, giving streamers the chance to work together with friends to do some exploration and build substantial bases. There are tons of multiplayer missions to take on as well, as well as space racing that can be done to add a racing element to the stream. Needless to say, No Man's Sky is a perfect option for Twitch due to its vast planets and exploration.

6 Roblox

So Much Variety For Everyone

Roblox is known for its extensive library of games created by players themselves, offering a wide variety of game modes for just about any taste. Whether viewers are looking to watch a streamer dress up their character in Dress to Impress or create crazy potions in Wacky Wizards, there's so much to enjoy.

This is what makes Roblox so perfect for streaming on Twitch. The game is completely free to play , making it accessible to just about anyone, so viewers can join in on the fun with their favorite streamers. Just about any game concept can be found here, and it can be incredibly fun to watch due to all the options available to stream, allowing streamers to switch things up whenever they want.

7 Final Fantasy 14 Online

Always Offering Fresh Content

Any fan of the Final Fantasy series knows that the content is endless here. For Final Fantasy 14 Online , the game is constantly being updated, with new DLC such as Dawntrail offering new quests for players to complete. This game is another solid option for streaming on Twitch, as the content is overflowing and streamers will never have to worry about running out of things to do.

Whether viewers are looking for some dungeon crawling, or want a bit of deep storytelling, Final Fantasy 14 Online has it all. The fanbase is strong as well, so viewers and streamers are always going to be around to enjoy the new content that becomes available for the game.

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero: Zhu Yuan Team Composition Guide
item.description:
The first two characters in the limited banner of Zenless Zone Zero consist of Attack Agents. The first one is Ellen, an Ice unit from the Victoria Housekeeping, while the second is Zhu Yuan, an Ether character from the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team.

ZZZ has a system where characters unlock an Additional Ability if the squad includes Agents with the same Attribute or from the same faction. While this limits the available Zenless Zone Zero team comps to some degree, it also makes it easier to determine who can work with whom. Here's an idea of what you need to have in Zhu Yuan team comp in ZZZ .

Zhu Yuan Team Comp In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

Unlike most characters whose Additional Ability unlocks when the squad consists of someone with the same Attribute or Faction, Zhu Yuan's Additional Ability activates when there's a support character or someone from the same faction. So, even though there are only two Ether characters in Zenless Zone Zero 1.0, Zhu Yuan can rely on other support Agents to open her Additional Ability, which grants her a whopping 30% Crit Rate. Zhu Yuan also gains extra DMG against Stunned enemies from her Core Skill, which makes placing a Stun character in her team a must.

In conclusion, Zhu Yuan's team comp in ZZZ should include one support and one Stun . Here are some viable characters for the role:

Support

  • Nicole
  • Rina
  • Soukaku
  • Lucy

Stun

  • Anby
  • Lycaon
  • Koleda

Players can play either of these teams, all of which will unlock everyone's Additional Ability:

  • Zhu Yuan + Anby + Nicole
  • Zhu Yuan + Lycaon + Rina
  • Zhu Yuan + Lycaon + Soukaku
  • Zhu Yuan + Koleda + Lucy

For the teamâ€™s rotation, start with the Stun unit and deal enough Daze DMG to stun enemies and trigger the Chain Attacks. Once Chain Attacks are activated, switch to the support and unleash their buff/debuff. After doing so, now is the perfect opportunity for Zhu Yuan to take the field and showcase her high and stable DMG.

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero: Zhu Yuan Guide (Best Build, Weapon, Drive Disc, & Skills)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Zhu Yuan Build In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero
  • Zhu Yuan Skills, Explained - Zenless Zone Zero
  • Zhu Yuan Best W-Engines In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero
  • Zhu Yuan Best Drive Discs In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

Despite having different mechanics and gameplay compared to other HoYoverse games, Zenless Zone Zero has a highly similar character-building system. Each unit must wield a weapon and have equipment that raises the rest of their stats. What's known as Artifact in Genshin Impact and Relic in Honkai: Star Rail is called Drive Discs in ZZZ .

Zhu Yuan relies heavily on her team since she gets most of her Shotshells by quickly swapping between her and her support. On the other hand, Zhu Yuan doesnâ€™t only depend on her team, sheâ€™s also a valuable DPS for them who can deal enough damage to melt enemies. However, for her to do this job properly, it's important for Proxies to know Zhu Yuan build in ZZZ .

Zhu Yuan Build In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

W-Engine

Drive Discs

Drive Discs Stat

  • Riot Suppressor Mark VI
  • The Brimstone
  • Steel Cushion
  • Cannon Rotor
  • Street Superstar
  • Starlight Engine

4-piece set :

  • Chaotic Metal

2-piece set :

  • Woodpecker Electro

  • 4 slot : Crit Rate/Crit DMG
  • 5 slot : Ether DMG Bonus
  • 6 slot : ATK
  • Sub-stat priority : Crit Rate, Crit DMG, ATK, PEN

Zhu Yuan Skills, Explained - Zenless Zone Zero

Zhu Yuan depends on her Suppressive Mode to deal higher damage, which you can activate by holding her Basic ATK . In this mode, Zhu Yuan starts consuming all the Shotshells she has collected. To get more Shotshells (up to 9), you can do the following:

  • Launch Chain Attack
  • Use EX Special Attack
  • Unleash Ultimate

Zhu Yuan Best W-Engines In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

Having a weapon that directly increases Zhu Yuanâ€™s Crit Rate and Crit DMG by 15% and 48% respectively is exactly what Zhu Yuan is looking for. Riot Suppressor Mark VI is, unsurprisingly, Zhu Yuanâ€™s Signature Weapon, which can also increase her Skill DMG by 35% when she deals Ether DMG.

On the other hand, you can go with Steel Cushion or The Brimstone as other 5-star options in ZZZ for Zhu Yuan. Steel Cushion grants some Crit Rate and DMG% while The Brimstone can maximize her ATK.

The best 4-star weapons for Zhu Yuan in Zenless Zone Zero are Cannon Rotor , Street Superstar , and Starlight Engine . Cannon Rotor is great since it increases Zhu Yuanâ€™s Crit Rate while increasing her ATK; sadly, this W-Engine is only obtainable from the Battle Pass. Street Superstar and Starlight Engine are more suitable as F2P W-Engine for Zhu Yuan in Zenless Zone Zero .

Zhu Yuan Best Drive Discs In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

Since the game still doesnâ€™t offer many DD options, build Zhu Yuan with 4pc of Chaotic Metal to maximize her Ether DMG. As for the 2pc left, Zhu Yuan is an Attack character who delivers when she can Crit properly. So, having 2pc of Woodpecker Electro automatically grants Zhu Yuan an extra 8% Crit Rate for her stats. If this combination is unavailable, players can also swap the two to make 4pc Woodpecker Electro + 2pc Chaotic Metal instead.

item.title: Once Human: Arachsiam Boss Guide
item.description:
Once Human has an impressive list of enemies, from basic zombies to military grunts and monsters that are a bit more unique in terms of looks and behavior. Bosses known as Great Ones stand out as the most dangerous of enemies in the game, and the spider-like Arachsiam is one of them.

Arachsiam is one of the most dangerous enemies early on in Once Human . While it's not particularly difficult to beat, it does have one specific mechanic that's had a lot of players scratching their heads. This guide covers all the mechanics you need to know about Arachsiam as well as some tips on how to beat it quickly.

How To Beat Arachsiam In Once Human

This boss poses a greater threat compared to the Treant and Ravenous Hunter bosses. It can swipe at players with its massive legs, and it can spit out webs that can completely encapsulate anyone who touches them, leaving them open to attacks. Additionally, Arachsiam can lay eggs that spawn smaller Spiders. On Hard mode and above, the boss also spawns bigger Deviants that are hard to take down without a good build and upgraded weapons in Once Human.

Fighting Arachsiam is mostly about spatial awareness. Avoid the web balls it spits out, and if it spews any spiders, squash them as soon as you can. The boss will lash out at players randomly, so don't let your guard down.

In Hard mode, you'll need some means of controlling the swarms of spiders and other Deviants that Arachsiam spawns. Combat Deviants like Zeno-Purifier, Lonewolf's Whisper, and Mini Feaster are all great for this fight, but if you can, try finding a group to play with.

Destroy the Eggs

Eventually, Arachsiam will fill the arena with mist and enter an invulnerability phase. To make her vulnerable again, you need to find and destroy spider eggs outside the arena. Check the other end of the web bridges and the walls surrounding you. The eggs should be visible even through the mist since they glow purple. If there are no more eggs outside, check the arena itself. If there are absolutely no eggs left, just wait a bit while dodging Arachsiam's attacks. The boss' shield should go down automatically.

Tips and Tricks

  • Using weapon accessories in Once Human can make hitting distant eggs much easier
  • Arachsiam's weakpoints are the glowing spots on her chest and rear thorax.
  • Damage-over-time effects like Burning and Frost Vortex can help you find Arachsiam through the mist.
  • On Hard mode and above, pay attention to the modifiers affecting the boss fight before going in.
  • Shoot webbed-up co-op partners to help them break free.
  • On harder difficulties, bring a grenade launcher or plenty of hand grenades.
